Configuration

The {{ names.name( 'proguard' ) }} cache is configured in the {{ names.abbreviation( 'sbt' ) }} build file via the {{ command( 'proguardCache in Android', 'scala' ) }} key. Directives added to the configuration simply contain the package identifiers that you want to add to the cache.

{{ code( 'page/proguard/cache/configuration.scala', 'scala' ) }}

You need to make sure to reference the actual package name (that you use with the {{ command( 'import' ) }} statement), and not the dependency group id. The play-json module for instance is included via {{ names.abbreviation( 'sbt' ) }} as {{ command( '"com.typesafe.play" %% "play-json" % "2.3.9"', 'scala' ) }}, but the actual root package identifier is simply {{ command( 'play' ) }}.
